verdict.summary: Production React error with details stripped. Use error decoder URL to see full message.

dead_ends.action: Search the error number on Google
dead_ends.why_fails: Decoder URL gives the exact message — Google results are usually generic

dead_ends.action: Switch to development build in production
dead_ends.why_fails: Never ship React dev build to production — huge performance penalty

workarounds.action: Visit the error decoder URL in the error message to get the full error text
Reproduce in development mode to get the full stack trace and error message
workarounds.how:
# Run the dev server instead of production build:
npm run dev  # or: NODE_ENV=development npm start
# React dev mode includes full error messages and component stack traces

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'Minified React error #XXX; visit https' is a runtime_error error while 'Error' has a different failure mode despite similar symptoms. Check error message details to differentiate.
